content.description: Start low on left arete of boulder with very low right hand undercling, and left hand around the arete on a thin but sharp crimp. Make moves along holds on the arete through the name sake hold to gain a good crimp on the face. Rock a high foot to roll over the arete to some easier but unprotected climbing to the top.
content.location: This is on the Beautiful and Bold boulder, just above Mega Man, and Link to the Past.

content.description: Sit start with a right hand crimp barely big enough for the tips of your fingers. Crank on the start hold to get established on your toes and proceed to climb up the center face of the short slab. The aretes are off.
content.location: This boulder is the short slab butting perpendicular to the Beautiful and Bold project. Just above Mega Man, and Link to the Past.

content.description: Proud!  This boulder is big and beautiful.  Could have a couple options:  First, climb the left side following the corner, the other would stay to the right(terrible landing and much harder).
content.protection: Lots of pads and spotters.  Surprisingly the landing is pretty good but the more right you move the worse it gets.
content.location: This boulder is directly behind the Mega Man boulder.

content.description: This is a version of the Beautiful and the Bold Project...   Start sitting, left hand on a good side pull, right on an okay sidepull.  Go left around the corner.  I spiraled around the boulder to topout, it seemed a bit safer.
In the woods above the Slant Boulder Field
